gus_emailer¶

__init__¶

models¶

class gus2.gus_emailer.models.emailer[source]¶

Enables Calender and User to trigger an email to another user or list of users.

@rtype: int @return: self.id

An individual message to be sent out throught the emailer

tests¶

This file demonstrates two different styles of tests (one doctest and one unittest). These will both pass when you run “manage.py test”.

Replace these with more appropriate tests for your application.

class gus2.gus_emailer.tests.SimpleTest(methodName='runTest')[source]¶
test_basic_addition()[source]¶

Tests that 1 + 1 always equals 2.
